system.description:
You studies and dealings have begun t o uncover the knowledge others would keep from you, granting you the following benefits:

  • You gain a +1 bonus to your Intelligence score, to a maximum value of 20.
  • Whenever you gain a new scholarly discovery, you may choose to learn an eldritch invocation or secret of arcana instead, and anytime you would gain an eldritch invocation you may gain a scholarly discovery instead.  You may add your warlock and scholar levels together to qualify for either eldritch invocations or scholarly discoveries other than sixth, seventh, eighth, or penultimate arcana and for the level of ritual you may add to your@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.tguawbanmxly12iz]{Book of Ancient Secrets} if you have one.
  • If you have access to your pact tome you may cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.59she20yqbp2giqq]{Contact Other Plane} as a ritual. This is true even if you do not normally have the ability to ritually cast or your level would not normally be high enough to do so, and the casting time does not increase when doing so as normal for ritual casting.
